name: part_009
file: tmp_ASACOCO LIVE NEWS on a Birthday？  #asacoco [SwodJntnYBg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Coco and Watame finish their conversation, saying goodbye to each other.
Coco reflects on Watame's surprise visit and prepares to show the viewers something special.
Coco appears in the mail-order room setting, reminiscing about the many products sold there.
Coco moves to the Gorilla Room setting and does an impression of Kanata doing an impression of Coco.
Coco visits Watame's meadow and does an impression of Watame's casual phone responses.
Coco enters a church-like setting and does an impression of Towa, teasing her about crying over the graduation news.
Coco goes to a candy room and performs an impression of Luna, imitating her unique way of speaking.
Coco returns to her main office setting, finding it the most relaxing, and prepares for the final segment.

subtitles.original: たくさん遊びに行こうぜ、たくさん。
subtitles.english: Let's go out and play a lot, a lot.

subtitles.original: ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: 影ながらね...
subtitles.english: From the shadows...

subtitles.original: 影、こっそり？
subtitles.english: Shadows, secretly?

subtitles.original: いや、こっそりしなくていいんだけど別に。うん。
subtitles.english: No, you don't have to be secret about it. Yeah.

subtitles.original: あの、ほら、あの、あ、あ、だ、だからあの、切るメンバーみたいにはなんないから、大丈夫。うん。
subtitles.english: Um, look, um, so, I won't be like a member that gets cut, so it's fine. Yeah.

subtitles.original: うん。
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: だから、あの、まあこっそり、こっそり。
subtitles.english: So, um, well, secretly, secretly.

subtitles.original: うん。まあこっそりじゃなくても...
subtitles.english: Yeah. Well, even if it's not secretly...

subtitles.original: こっそりじゃなくても、こっそりでも、仲良くしてください。
subtitles.english: Whether it's secretly or not, please be on good terms with me.

subtitles.original: これからも一緒にやると思ってるから、こちらこそ。
subtitles.english: I think we'll be doing things together from now on, so same here.

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: わためーな！
subtitles.english: Watame!

subtitles.original: Thank you!
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 頑張ってね！
subtitles.english: Good luck!

subtitles.original: 誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがとうわためめめ！アイボーパーパー！
subtitles.english: Thank you Watame-me-me! Aibo bye-bye!

subtitles.original: バイバーイ、バイバイ、バイバイ。
subtitles.english: Bye bye, bye bye, bye bye.

subtitles.original: Thank you!
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: ちょ、本当に、本当に聞いていなかったんですけど。
subtitles.english: Wait, really, I really didn't hear about this.

subtitles.original: あの、流れになさすぎて、何かわかんなくて。
subtitles.english: It was so out of the blue, I didn't know what was happening.

subtitles.original: ちょっとこういう流れに、されちまったよー！
subtitles.english: I got dragged into this kind of flow!

subtitles.original: 父さん皆さんどう思います？卑怯な女だよあいつは、卑怯な女だよ。
subtitles.english: Everyone, what do you think? She's a cowardly woman, she's a cowardly woman.

subtitles.original: こうやっていいとこ持って行きやがって！
subtitles.english: Taking the best part for herself like that!

subtitles.original: ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: ああ、もちろんね、父さんの皆さんも、ずっと一緒にね、歩んできた、相棒であるということは、間違いないんですが...
subtitles.english: Ah, of course, you everyone too, there's no doubt you are partners who have walked together for a long time, but...

subtitles.original: わためはね、あの、ちょっと特別だったんで。
subtitles.english: Watame was, well, a little special.

subtitles.original: わたここてぇてぇ。
subtitles.english: WataCoco wholesome.

subtitles.original: 次なんだっけ？
subtitles.english: What was next?

subtitles.original: あいた、え、ちょっとあの、ちょっと顔汚くなっちゃったからね、あの準備、して来ようと思います。皆、ちょっと待っててよ。
subtitles.english: Ouch, um, my face got a bit dirty, so I'm going to go and get ready. Everyone, wait a moment.

subtitles.original: いいもの見せるから。待っててよね、準備してくる！
subtitles.english: I'll show you something good. Wait for it, I'll go get ready!

subtitles.original: おい、おい、おい、おい、おい、おい、おい。
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey.

subtitles.original: これは！思い出の！
subtitles.english: This is! A memory!

subtitles.original: 通販部屋！
subtitles.english: The mail-order room!

subtitles.original: ここでね、何億もの商品が、売れたらしいんですね！
subtitles.english: I heard that hundreds of millions of products were sold here!

subtitles.original: おえ、おえ、おえ、おえ、おえ。
subtitles.english: Ugh, ugh, ugh, ugh, ugh.

subtitles.original: これは、噂の、ゴリラ部屋！
subtitles.english: This is the rumored Gorilla Room!

subtitles.original: ついに天国に来ちまったか。
subtitles.english: Have I finally come to heaven?

subtitles.original: かなたん、おるか？
subtitles.english: Kanatan, are you there?

subtitles.original: え、天音かなたがやる、桐生ココのモノマネ。
subtitles.english: Um, Amane Kanata's impression of Kiryu Coco.

subtitles.original: うぅ〜、桐生ココですぅ。
subtitles.english: Uhh, I'm Kiryu Coco.

subtitles.original: 捜査混同すな。
subtitles.english: Don't confuse the investigation.

subtitles.original: そんなんじゃねぇよバカ！
subtitles.english: It's not like that, idiot!

subtitles.original: おいおいおいおいおいおいおい！
subtitles.english: Hey hey hey hey hey hey hey!

subtitles.original: これは！わための！
subtitles.english: This is! Watame's!

subtitles.original: 大草原！爆笑！
subtitles.english: Great Meadow! LOL!

subtitles.original: わためが、通話してるときに、よくやる適当な返事のモノマネ。
subtitles.english: Watame's impression of the random replies she often gives while on a call.

subtitles.original: う〜ん。あっ。あ〜。
subtitles.english: Hmm. Ah. Oh.

subtitles.original: そんなんじゃいないかな？
subtitles.english: Isn't it like that?

subtitles.original: おいおいおいおいおい！
subtitles.english: Hey hey hey hey hey!

subtitles.original: おい、おい、おいおいおい、おいおいおい。
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, hey hey hey, hey hey hey.

subtitles.original: こえ〜よ、なんか。悪魔に悪いことされそう。
subtitles.english: Scary... I feel like a devil's going to do something bad to me.

subtitles.original: と、常様？常様おる？
subtitles.english: T-Towa-sama? Is Towa-sama there?

subtitles.original: 常様ね、悪魔とか言ってるんですけど、
subtitles.english: Towa-sama says she's a devil, but...

subtitles.original: 何か私の卒業聞いて一番泣いてたの常様なんですよ。乙女なんですよ。
subtitles.english: She was the one who cried the most when she heard about my graduation. She's a maiden.

subtitles.original: ぴーぴー泣いてんじゃねーぞ！おい！
subtitles.english: Don't be crying like a baby! Hey!

subtitles.original: んなぁ〜。ここちゃ〜ん。
subtitles.english: Nnaaa~ Coco-chan.

subtitles.original: あ、う、なななら。行かないで、ほしいなら〜。
subtitles.english: Ah, u, nananara. Don't go, if you want~.

subtitles.original: ちょっと似てます？ちょっとだけ頑張ったんですけど。
subtitles.english: Does it sound like her? I tried a little bit.

subtitles.original: ここちゃ、今度、たこ焼き、焼肉、行くなら〜。
subtitles.english: Coco-cha, next time, if we go for takoyaki or yakiniku~.

subtitles.original: んなは、何もしないのらだけど、見ててな！
subtitles.english: Nna won't do anything, but watch me!

subtitles.original: んなぁ！おい！
subtitles.english: Nnaa! Hey!

subtitles.original: おい、おいおいおいおい、おいおいおいおい。
subtitles.english: Hey, hey hey hey hey, hey hey hey hey.

subtitles.original: ま、やっぱここが一番落ち着きますね。ふぅー。
subtitles.english: Well, this place is the most relaxing after all. Phew.

subtitles.original: あ、そろそろ時間かな？
subtitles.english: Ah, is it almost time?

subtitles.original: おいおいおい、では行ってきますね。
subtitles.english: Hey hey hey, well, I'm off.
